rule: The output should consist of the input paragraph split into individual sentences.
input: Dr. Smith arrived early. He prepared for the lecture. Students awaited eagerly.

Dr. Smith arrived **early** to his lecture preparation.

He prepared for a full day of lectures and discussions.

students await ing attention and guidance from Dr. Smith.

Dr. Smith arrived early, he would be there ready to engage all his students.
